author: nadiramra
msg: C support fixes/enhancements.

author: sebor
msg: 2006-05-14  Martin Sebor  <sebor@roguewave.com>
* rw_allocator.h: New header with the definition of a user-defined
allocator class template.
* allocator.cpp: New source containing definitions of helper classes
and functions used by the user-defined allocator template.

author: dreid
msg: This commit brings in the new code I've been working on.
*** This is not a finished product! ***
It works and will generate xdocs that very closely resemble
the old ones, but does it using far fewer network connections.
This will likely not work on Windows :-(
It moves us to a much neater object oriented structure that should
make maintenance a bit easier.
It adds a few very minor improvements to the old code along the way.
After doing this I realised what Joshua was asking for all those months
ago, so I'll try and add a new tutorial explaining how to add a new
index. It's not as bad as Joshua was implying, but does need a touch more
information than I had provided. I hope to have that soon.
The support libs need to be upgraded to the latest versions for this
to work.
There are still a few more improvements on my mind to add, but holidays
will intervene in them getting completed.
